snippet.title: Persephone - Announcement Trailer (Upcoming Indie Game on Steam) Early 2020
snippet.description:
••► Release Date : Early Access 2020
••► Developer / Publisher : Momo-pi / Momo-pi, Plug In Digital
••► Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1132180/Persephone/

==========

What if death isn't the end, but the key to solve puzzles? Where, when and how will you choose to die in order to progress? Transport yourself to this magical world enriched with beautiful graphics and captivating music.

==========
